sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SYSM1400 ( DPOB_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , PAY_DUTY_TM_CALC_SEIL_NUM , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_SUM , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_MGFTN , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_SUM , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_MGFTN , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #emymtDivCd# , #payDutyTmCalcSeilNum# , #wkdyEryGtwkExtpyMgftn# , #wkdyEryGtwkExtpySum# , #wkdyNorDutyExtpyMgftn# , #wkdyNorDutyExtpySum# , #wkdyExtnnExtpyMgftn# , #wkdyExtnnExtpySum# , #wkdyNgtExtpyMgftn# , #wkdyNgtExtpySum# , #pubcHodyNorDutyMgftn# , #pubcHodyNorDutySum# , #pubcHodyExtnnMgftn# , #pubcHodyExtnnSum# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SYSM1400 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# , PAY_DUTY_TM_CALC_SEIL_NUM=#payDutyTmCalcSeilNum# , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_MGFTN=#wkdyEryGtwkExtpyMgftn# , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_SUM=#wkdyEryGtwkExtpySum# , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_MGFTN=#wkdyNorDutyExtpyMgftn# , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_SUM=#wkdyNorDutyExtpySum# , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_MGFTN=#wkdyExtnnExtpyMgftn# , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_SUM=#wkdyExtnnExtpySum# , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_MGFTN=#wkdyNgtExtpyMgftn# , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_SUM=#wkdyNgtExtpySum# , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_MGFTN=#pubcHodyNorDutyMgftn# , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_SUM=#pubcHodyNorDutySum# , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_MGFTN=#pubcHodyExtnnMgftn# , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_SUM=#pubcHodyExtnnSum# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# AND PAY_DUTY_TM_CALC_SEIL_NUM=#payDutyTmCalcSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM SYSM1400 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# AND PAY_DUTY_TM_CALC_SEIL_NUM=#payDutyTmCalcSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , PAY_DUTY_TM_CALC_SEIL_NUM , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_SUM , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_MGFTN , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_SUM , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_MGFTN , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM SYSM1400 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd# AND PAY_DUTY_TM_CALC_SEIL_NUM=#payDutyTmCalcSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , EMYMT_DIV_CD , PAY_DUTY_TM_CALC_SEIL_NUM , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_ERY_GTWK_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_NOR_DUTY_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_EXTNN_EXTPY_SUM , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_MGFTN , WKDY_NGT_EXTPY_SUM , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_MGFTN , PUBC_HODY_NOR_DUTY_SUM , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_MGFTN , PUBC_HODY_EXTNN_SUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM SYSM1400 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EMYMT_DIV_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , EMYMT_DIV_CD DESC , PAY_DUTY_TM_CALC_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM SYSM1400 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
EMYMT_DIV_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
